name: Ancient Boreal Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 30 ft.
description: The Ancient Boreal Dragon is a gargantuan dragon with a towering presence and immense power, embodying chaotic neutral alignment. It features a shimmering blue and white exterior reflecting its icy nature and burns with embers.
memorable: Known for its devastating Cinder Breath and Ember Wreath abilities, this dragon strikes fear with its Frightful Presence, making it a legendary threat on the battlefield.
goals: Its usual goals include dominating territory, intimidating other creatures, and preserving its lair's safety.
relations: They could be encountered alongside other mighty dragons or serve as a powerful adversary for adventurers seeking to claim its domain.
environment: Usually found in icy mountains, frigid caverns, or arctic regions.
strengths: Exceptionally high AC of 22, powerful melee attacks, devastating breath weapon, and incredibly high passive perception.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage and has average dexterity, limiting its evasion capabilities.
attacks: Employs a fearsome bite, sharp claws, and a powerful tail across multiple attacks, alongside area-damage breath weapon and fear-inducing presence.
most_powerful_ability: Cinder Breath releases a terrifying 90-foot cone of superheated air, causing massive fire damage to affected creatures.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a passive perception of 28, allowing it to detect hidden threats easily.
skills: Excels in athletics and perception, with a high passive perception score indicating acute awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws three times per day.
Can use Ember Wreath to create a damaging area around itself.
Employs Frightful Presence to instill fear in its foes.
Can manipulate the battlefield with legendary actions.
